alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mercer and southwestern Middlesex Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, a mesonet weather station reported a strong thunderstorm over Lawrenceville, or near Trenton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Ewing, Princeton, Hightstown, Cranbury, Edinburg, Princeton Meadows, Windsor, Kingston, Twin Rivers, Mercerville-Hamilton Square, Plainsboro Center, Lawrenceville, Kendall Park, White Horse, Princeton Junction, Princeton North, Heathcote and Monmouth Junction. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 8A. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 62 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
